Package com.flipfit.business

Interface adminInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminService
public interface adminInterface
The AdminInterface defines the contract for all administrative operations. Any class that implements this interface must provide the functionality to manage gym centers, gym owners, and customers.
Author:
